name: random_move
description: Get a random valid move for educational or casual play. Use when user wants surprise moves, random suggestions, or less competitive gameplay. Returns position 1-9 of a randomly chosen valid move.

board.description: Current board state as array of 9 elements. Each element is 'X', 'O', or null for empty cells. Index 0 = position 1, index 8 = position 9.

player.description: Which player to generate a random move for ('X' for human, 'O' for AI)

game_over.description: Whether the current game has ended (win/tie)

winner.description: Winner of the game if ended: 'X', 'O', or null for tie/ongoing
